text: Grey coat, Greycoat, Graycoat, or Grey Coat may refer to: * Grey (coat colour) of horses * Grey Coat Hospital, girls' school in Westminster, London * Greycoats (band), indie rock group from Minneapolis, Minnesota * Confederate States Army soldier, nickname based on: ** Uniforms of the Confederate States military forces, mostly had gray coats ==See also== * "Graycoat Soldiers" track on The Fields of November, 1974 album by Norman Blake
title: Grey coat
